attributes.action: Reduce Immigrants within the United Kingdom, Currently Claiming Benifits and choosing not to Work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is the proposal to remove the vast amount of immigrants that are claiming benifits from the government and not working to give money back, this takes a large percentage of the tax that British Citizens pay annually to the government. Therefore giving immigrants free money not to work, i propose the removal of such entities and the reduction of benifits given to such communities

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
